Dating: MIDDLE KINGDOM (not before); MIDDLE KINGDOM ?; NEW KINGDOM (not after)
Name: Group of fighters
Description: This group statue in limestone, which was purchased in the art trade in 1938, represents two fighters on a large rounded socle. The bodies of the two figures are leaning towards the ground so that their shoulders are touching. The piece resembles the figurines which date from 1st Intermediate Period and from the Middle Kingdom.
